title: Their Eyes Were Watching God - each man who drove

content.question: It can be inferred that each man who drove "considerable distances" (paragraph 4) to see Janie was

choices.label: assuaging his guilt for not having been closer
interested in helping her preserve her financial integrity
hoping to convince her that he would be a worthy successor to Joe
troubled to see Janie fail to live according to religious principles

content.answer: hoping to convince her that he would be a worthy successor to Joe

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify and describe what specific textual details reveal about a character, that character's perspective, and that character's motives.
